titles.title: Angels We Have Heard on High

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Angels we have heard on high, sweetly singing o'er the plains, and the mountains in reply echoing their joyous strains:

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Gloria, in excelsis Deo! Gloria, in excelsis Deo!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Shepherds, why this jubilee? Why your joyous strains prolong? What the gladsome tidings be which inspire your heav'nly song? [Refrain]

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Come to Bethlehem and see Him whose birth the angels sing; come, adore on bended knee Christ the Lord, the new-born King. [Refrain]

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: See within a manger laid Jesus, Lord of heaven and earth! Mary, Joseph, lend your aid, sing with us our Savior's birth. [Refrain]
